title: Speakeasy Mac
description: Native macOS menu bar app for text-to-speech using AVSpeechSynthesizer. Built with Swift and Claude Code.

title: NBA Game Recommender
description: NBA most engaging game of the week. Find the best games to watch based on competitive metrics.

title: Render Status
description: CLI tool to check the status of deployments and cronjobs in Render. Monitor your Render services from the command line.
